casebody.data:
THE TEXAS COMPANY, PLAINTIFF-PETITIONER, v. MARCO Di GAETANO, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Messrs. Katzenbach, Gildea & Budner, and Mr. Milton Handler and Mr. Amzy B. Steed, of the New York Bar, for the petitioner. Messrs. Bilder, Bidder & Freeman for the respondent. April 30, 1962.

See same case below: 71 N. J. Super. 413.
